# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_OCCUPANTS_TAKE_EXPLOSIVE_DAMAGE

## Summary
Ensures occupants will take damage even if their attached vehicle is flagged as invincible/explosion proof. Won't work if ped is flagged as invincible/explosion proof

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** vehicleOccupantsTakeExplosiveDamage = false

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets whether vehicle occupants can take explosive damage if the vehicle is invincible/explosion proof.
